casebody.data:
The New York Life Insurance Co., Respondent v. James Aitkin, as Executor, etc., Appellant. Decided November 10, 1891. Appeal from part of order allowing defendant to amend answer terms. Johnston & Johnston, for appellant. H. G. Atwater, *491for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements.
